title: Enable all features
description: Enables all settings for you even if your account is not eligible for these

title: Remove Instagram analytic telemetry
description: When this option is set to 0, the application prevents the creation of files in the "app_analytics" folder, which allows you to keep a correct size of the application.
flags: analytics2 consolidation max batch lock attempts

title: Remove annoying play store update dialog
Upload photos up to 1440p resolution in stories
description: By default the photos you upload to stories are 1080, enabling this setting will increase the resolution up to 1440.

title: Reduce compression of photo uploads in the feed
description: 70 = 30% compression
100 = 0% compression (without compression)

title: High quality video uploads on stories and reels
description: Enter the name and enable the toggle and put the bitrate mbps to 20 (recommended).

You can change it to 20 if you use video with 1080p or 1440p resolution (for slightly better compression). And the maximum bitrate you can use is 30 (suitable for 4k video) but there is a possibility that the video will fail to upload if you use bitrate above 25Mbps so be careful.
After enabling the setting restart the app, and then go to the Instagram settings > Account or Preferences > Cellular data use > and turn on the "Upload at highest quality" option.

title: Enable 48khz sample rate
flags: cameracore fbaudio ig use 48khz sample rate

title: Customize buttons layout
description: Words You Can Use in Changeable Settings (between tab 0-4 and top bar 0-2); (When typing, you should write them all in lowercase.)
-   home
-   explore
-   clips
-   shopping
-   profile
-   direct
-   share
-   news
-   menu
-   friend_map
-   groups

title: Change activity icon to bell icon
description: Photo preview pending

title: Filled bottom row buttons
description: Only works for the buttons on the bottom row.

title: New dark mode
description: Enable the new dark mode in instagram, from being an amoled black to a more pleasant dark blue

title: Fix empty space below bottom navigation bar
Enable sheet multi tab
description: The is share tab enabled option inside this flag can cause in some version a crash when trying to open a post in feed comments through the See all comments, instead press the comments action to open comments

title: Convos reshare
description: New media button in dm, with some cools features

title: User avatar size in stories tray
Channels tab
description: Enable everything except:
-   disable channels tab badging
-   disable mesages tab badging
-   fetch channels on startup (this makes unloadable direct list)
-   decline invitations from inbox enabled

title: Show save animation
flags: should show save flow on tap

title: New swipe to camera animation
flags: camera android nav3 bottom creation animation

title: Feed video scrubber
description: Attention!!! Only works for reels videos in the main feed. This doesn't work for igtv, regular video, and carousel videos in the following & favorites tabs, explore tab, and profile tab.

title: New sharing shortcut
description: Attention!!! Not recommended to activate the 3rd option because the "add X to your story" button doesn't appear on igtv posts and regular video posts in the profile tab & explore tab.

title: Super share v3
description: Enable everything, and modify add top story hscroll to 0 if you want the add to story button, or set it to 1 to remove it

title: Add notes to posts/reels
description: No preview until it works again

title: Watch reels with friends
description: allows you to watch reels with people in your chats or with people you follow and follow back.
Attention!!! only works on other people who also have this setting enabled.
Not working in newer versions

title: Hide Follow button
description: Removes the follow button while watching reels.

title: Timestamp
description: Enter the name and enable all the toggles.
Removed in newer versions

title: Show the number of views on your own reels
description: Show the ammount of users that have seen your reel
No idea why it does not work

title: Caption translations
description: Only activate the 1st option.

title: Swipe left to view profile
description: Only works on reels tab.

title: Hide suggested posts with certain words
description: With this option you can hide or get rid of suggested posts that have certain words and emojis in the captions of the video, after adding the word you want to hide then all suggested posts that have that word in their captions 'will not' appear in your feed and reels tab as suggested posts.

title: Text to speech
description: This feature is only available for reels and not for stories.

title: Enable listen in spotify, or add to spotify playlist
Share comments
description: Pending serverside release on my account

title: New search tab design
description: Long press search icon to search

title: Rounded edges on the mentioned story
description: When resharing a story where you have been mentioned, no sound will be audible

title: Sound button
description: Can be enabled, but wont work in newer versions

description: Removed in newer versions

title: Chat translations

title: Wall notes

It stays on your profile for up to 3 days
You can choose to remove any notes added by your followers
